attributes.action: scrap the bbc licence fee as I feel that paying the fee is paying for a peadophile network.
attributes.additional_details:
Iam totally digusted that peodophilia has been endemic within the BBC and covered up by senior management.
      The senior management team said nothing and I beilive that even today bbc managment knew that this went on, Iam not going to pay my tv tax anymore and i hope millions of people follow suit.
